transformation
Class Window2D

java.lang.Object
  transformation.Window2D

public class Window2D
extends java.lang.Object

A class which translates between pixel-space and coordinate-space.

Author:
Curran Kelleher

makeWindowSquare

public void makeWindowSquare()
Changes the pixel space of this window and it's (x,y) offsets such that the aspect ratios of the coordinate space and the pixel space are the same, eliminating distortion.

set

public void set(double xMin,
                double xMax,
                double yMin,
                double yMax)
Sets the coordinate space

Parameters:
xMin - The minimum x value in the coordinate space.
xMax - The maximum x value in the coordinate space.
yMin - The minimum y value in the coordinate space.
yMax - The maximum y value in the coordinate space.

zoomToRectangle

public void zoomToRectangle(java.awt.Rectangle rectangle)
Changes the coordinate space of this window to reflect the specified rectangle as it is transformed to the original coordinate space. This will cause distortion if the rectangle is not a square, so if you don't want any distortion, call makeWindowSquare() after calling this method.

Parameters:
rectangle - the rectangle to zoom to
